Add or update a group in the datasource.

  id={"request"}

>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Describes the request body of the /indexgroup API call","properties":{"version":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Version number for document for optimistic concurrency control. If absent or 0 then no version checks are done."},"datasource":{"type":"string","description":"The datasource for which the group is added"},"group":{"description":"The group to be added or updated","type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"name of the group. Should be unique among all groups for the datasource, and cannot have spaces."}},"required":["name"],"title":"DatasourceGroupDefinition"}},"required":["datasource","group"],"title":"IndexGroupRequest"}}},"required":true,"x-exportParamName":"IndexGroupRequest"}}
